text: The Big Chill is a 1983 American comedy-drama movie. It is about baby boomer friends reuniting after 15 years due to a friend's suicide. This movie stars Tom Berenger, Glenn Close and Mary Kay Place. It was filmed in Beaufort, South Carolina and set in South Carolina. == Other websites == * Category:1983 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English- language movies Category:Movies set in South Carolina Category:Suicide in fiction Category:Movies directed by Lawrence Kasdan Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Big Chill (movie)
